The Toronto Raptors defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 122 - 95 , at Air Canada Centre on Monday . In a battle between two of the best defenses in the league , the Raptors were able to prevail with a much needed win . In fact , Toronto led for the final 44 - plus minutes , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . Shooting was the key difference , with Toronto shooting 55 percent from the field and 68 percent from three - point range , while Philadelphia shot just 42 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range . The Raptors ( 4 - 14 ) had to play this game without Joel Embiid and Jahlil Okafor , but they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to keep up with the Raptors . Robert Covington led the way for Philadelphia , as he tallied 20 points , five rebounds and two steals . Jahlil Okafor was second on the team , with his 15 points and five rebounds . Sergio Rodriguez started for Embiid and accrued 11 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Richaun Holmes was a nice spark off the bench , totaling 11 points and nine rebounds . On deck for Philly is a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 11 - 6 ) have now won five - straight games , as they continue to fall down the standings . Kyle Lowry was the player of the game , as he accumulated 24 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Terrence Ross was second on the team , as he accrued 22 points and three rebounds off the bench . Jonas Valanciunas recorded a double - double , totaling 12 points and 11 rebounds . Terrence Ross was a nice spark off the bench , providing 22 points and three rebounds on 8 - of - 11 shooting . Toronto will look to start a new winning streak on Friday in a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 102 - 101 , at Wells Fargo Center on Monday . The Cavaliers ( 60 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it was n't enough to escape with a win . The key for Cleveland was their defense , as they held the 76ers to 46 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range . The Sixers also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than the Sixers , while committing six less turnovers . The Cavaliers ( 0 - 6 ) have been one of the hottest teams in the league and this win only adds to those deficiencies . LeBron James was the star , as he accumulated 25 points , eight rebounds and 14 assists . Kevin Love was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 20 points and 11 rebounds . Tristan Thompson was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed seven points , 13 rebounds and two blocks . Channing Frye was a nice spark off the bench , providing 12 points , two rebounds and two steals . On deck for the Cavaliers is a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday . The 76ers ( 0 - 5 ) have been one of the worst home teams in the league right now and they continue to disappoint . On deck for the Sixers is a road matchup against the Orlando Magic on Friday .
The Houston Rockets ( 56 - 26 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 38 - 44 ) 117 - 91 on Sunday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 31 - 15 right away in the first quarter . Along with the strong start , the Rockets also shot 54 percent from the field and 43 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 38 percent from the floor and a meager 19 percent from beyond the arc . The Rockets also out - rebounded the Jazz 49 - 44 , giving them even more of an advantage . The Rockets were led by James Harden , who went 3 - for - 8 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and 10 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaged 15 points , 11 rebounds and 10 assists per game . Terrence Jones also had a solid showing , scoring 15 points ( 6 - 6 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , to go along with three assists and three blocked shots . It was a season - high in points for Jones , who 's only reached double figures in points one other time this season , so it was a nice surprise for the Rockets . Dwight Howard had a strong showing as well , going 6 - for - 7 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 14 points , while also adding eight rebounds and two blocked shots . It was a new season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Rockets , as he 's averaging only 13 points on the year . The Rockets received nearly all of their production from rookie Bryce Cotton , who went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 7 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 14 points , to go along with three assists in 25 minutes . It was a new season - high in points for him , who 's only reached double figures in points one other time this season . Coming off the bench , rookie Bryce Cotton went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 7 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 14 points in 25 minutes . It was a new season - high in points for him . Rodney Hood chipped in with 10 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) and two assists . The Rockets ' next game will be at home against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Wednesday , while the Jazz will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

The Lakers were able to coast to the victory in the second half , out - scoring the Pacers 28 - 15 right away in the first quarter . The Lakers were able to out - score the Lakers 28 - 15 in the first quarter , while grabbing an uncharacteristic six turnovers . The Lakers were able to out - rebound the Lakers 50 - 37 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Lakers were led by Kobe Bryant , who went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding six rebounds and six assists . He 's been on fire of late , averaging 20 points and 6 rebounds over his last three games . Kobe Bryant also did his part on the offensive side of the ball . He went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding six rebounds , six assists and three steals as well . He 's had a nice two - game stretch where he 's averaging 15 points , 3 rebounds and 5 assists , as he continues to be one of the few bright spots in this one . Also coming off the bench , Nick Young shot 4 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 22 points . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Lakers , as he 's averaging only 12 points per game so far this season . Also off the bench , Carlos Boozer added 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 2 FT ) and four rebounds . The Lakers received most of their production from C.J . Miles , who went 7 - for - 18 from the field and 3 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding two steals in 32 minutes . He 's now averaging 16 points and 4 rebounds on the year . Donald Sloan was the only other starter in double figures , as he finished with 16 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , seven rebounds and nine assists . He 's had a nice stretch of four games , averaging 17 points , 6 rebounds and 2 assists over that span , so it was good to see him get things turned back around and have a decent showing . Roy Hibbert added 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 11 rebounds of his own . The Lakers ' next game will be at home against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Pacers will travel to Oakland to play the Golden State Warriors on Monday .

Along with the strong start , the Bulls also shot 42 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards went 42 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls were led by the duo of Pau Gasol and Nikola Mirotic . Gasol went 8 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while adding 10 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was a season - high in points for Mirotic , who had n't reached double figures yet this year , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Aaron Brooks also had a strong showing , finishing with 22 points ( 8 - 23 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and eight assists . It was his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 21 points and 12 rebounds . Pau Gasol chipped in with 20 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and 10 rebounds of his own . It was his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 15 points and 12 rebounds . Coming off the bench , Nikola Mirotic added 23 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 8 - 11 FT ) and eight rebounds in 32 minutes . For the Wizards , John Wall did everything he could to keep the Wizards in this game . He went 8 - for - 20 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 21 points , while also adding 11 assists and two blocked shots . It was a nice bounce back game for him after scoring only six points on Sunday . Marcin Gortat had a nice showing as well , finishing with 12 points ( 6 - 9 FG ) and 12 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 12 rebounds per game . Marcin Gortat had a double - double of his own with 12 points ( 6 - 9 FG ) and 12 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 56 points and 14 rebounds over his last two matchups . The Bulls ' next game will be at home against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , while the Wizards will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Saturday .

The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Boston Celtics , 128 - 122 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Monday . The Cavaliers ( 20 ) came into this game as a rare road favorite and they left no doubt with this dominating victory . In fact , Cleveland led for the final 30 - plus minutes , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . The key for Cleveland was their shooting , as they shot 49 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range , while holding the Celtics to 48 percent from the field and 34 percent from three - point range . Boston also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than the Celtics , while committing four less turnovers . The Celtics ( 3 - 2 ) had to play this game without Al Horford and Jae Crowder , but they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to pull out the upset . Isaiah Thomas led the way for Boston , as he tallied 30 points , three rebounds and six assists . Defense was key for the Hawks , as they held the Spurs to 33 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . The Hawks also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 46 - 47 . The Spurs ( 27 - 7 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to fall down the standings . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for San Antonio , as he collected 27 points , 13 rebounds and three blocks . Tony Parker finished second on the team , totaling 22 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Pau Gasol was the only other Spur in double figures , providing 18 points , nine rebounds and two assists . On deck for San Antonio is a road matchup with the Orlando Magic on Wednesday . The Utah Jazz ( 4 - 6 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 2 - 8 ) 102 - 100 on Tuesday at the Madison Square Garden in New York . The Jazz got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 31 - 17 right away in the first quarter . The Jazz were able to use a strong first half , out - scoring the Knicks 31 - 23 right away in the first quarter . The Jazz were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 46 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 48 percent from the floor and 63 percent from beyond the arc . The Jazz had all five starters reach double figures in points . Gordon Hayward led the way , going 11 - for - 18 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 33 points , while also adding six assists and four steals . It was a season - high in points for him , who 's only reached double figures in points one other time this season . Derrick Favors also played well , finishing with 21 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 5 - 7 FT ) , 12 rebounds and three blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 58 points and 14 rebounds over his last two games . Trey Burke was the other big contributor for the Jazz , as he finished with 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) and eight assists . He 's now averaging 15 points and 4 rebounds on the year . Trey Burke was the other starter in double figures , as he finished with 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) and eight assists . The Knicks received most of their production from Carmelo Anthony , who went off for a game - high of 46 points ( 16 - 26 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 13 - 16 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds and a steal . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 58 points and 14 rebounds over his last two games . Pablo Prigioni was the only other Knick in double figures , as he finished with 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , two steals and four assists . He 's now averaging 16 points and 8 rebounds on the year . The only other Knick in double figures was Pablo Larkin , who came off the bench for 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , two steals and four steals . The Jazz 's next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Knicks will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Tuesday .

The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 104 - 93 , in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Quicken Loans Arena to take a 10 lead in the Eastern Conference semifinals . The Cavaliers had a strong start to the season , out - scoring the Hawks 30 - 19 in the first quarter . However , the Cavaliers came out strong in the third quarter , out - scoring the Hawks 30 - 19 to close out the game . The Cavaliers were led by Dennis Schroder , who scored a game - high 27 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 5 - 10 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , along with six assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 29 minutes off the bench . Kyrie Irving added 21 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , eight assists , two blocked shots and one steal , in 34 minutes . Kevin Love was solid with 17 points ( 4 - 17 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , 11 rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 38 minutes . The Cavaliers shot 45 percent from the field and 48 percent from long range , as they cruised to the win . LeBron James led the way for the Hawks , with 25 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , along with nine assists , seven rebounds , five steals and one blocked shot , in 41 minutes . Kyrie Irving added 21 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , eight assists , two blocked shots and one steal , in 34 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Hawks was Al Horford , who finished with 10 . The Hawks shot a brutal 38 percent from the field and 32 percent from long range . Next , the Hawks will host the Timberwolves on Monday . The Cavaliers will look to snap their losing streak as they host the Nets on Sunday .

Defense was key for New York , as they held the Pacers to 44 percent from the field , 27 percent from three - point range and 80 percent from the free - throw line . New York also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 43 - 34 . The Knicks ( 20 - 26 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to fall down the standings . Carmelo Anthony was the star , as he scored a game - high 26 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting . Derrick Rose was second on the team , finishing with 20 points , three rebounds and six assists . Willy Hernangomez was the only other player in double figures , as he totaled 14 points and 10 rebounds . Willy Hernangomez was a nice spark off the bench , providing 14 points and 10 rebounds on 5 - of - 8 shooting . The Knicks ( 22 - 22 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to fall down the standings . Paul George carried the load , as he accumulated 31 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two steals . Myles Turner finished second on the team , totaling 22 points and 10 rebounds . Jeff Teague accrued seven points , four rebounds and seven assists . Al Jefferson led the bench , as he provided 13 points and three rebounds .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors , 115 - 84 , in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Quicken Loans Arena to take a 10 lead in the Eastern Conference finals . The Cavs led for much of the first three quarters , but the Cavs battled back to take a 10 - point lead into the half . The Raptors came out strong in the third quarter , out - scoring the Raptors 33 - 16 , to take a 10 - point lead into the final frame . The Cavaliers were able to hold the lead for the rest of the game , but the Cavs were able to hold off the Raptors in the second half . Kyrie Irving led the way for the Cavs , finishing with 27 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , five assists , two rebounds , two steals and two blocked shots , in 30 minutes . LeBron James added 24 points ( 11 - 13 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , six rebounds , four assists , two steals and one blocked shot , in 28 minutes . Kevin Love was solid with 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , four rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 28 minutes . The Cavaliers shot 55 percent from the field and 35 percent from long range , as they cruised to the win . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors , with 18 points ( 9 - 17 FG ) , five assists and five rebounds , in 35 minutes . Bismack Biyombo was solid in 31 minutes off the bench , with 12 points ( 5 - 5 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds , two steals and two steals , in 31 minutes . Bismack Biyombo was solid in 31 minutes off the bench , with 12 points ( 5 - 5 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds , two steals and two steals , in 31 minutes .

The Clippers also out - rebounded the Wizards 46 - 36 . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 58 points and 20 assists over his last two games . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Clippers , as he 's averaging only nine points per game on the season . The only other Clipper to reach double figures in points was DeAndre Jordan , who finished with 10 points ( 5 - 7 FG ) and three rebounds . The Wizards ' next game will be at home against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , while the Wizards will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Saturday .

The Houston Rockets ( 2 - 3 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 1 - 4 ) 119 - 114 on Saturday . In a battle between two of the best offenses in the league , the Magic were able to prevail with a huge road win . In fact , they led for the final 44 minutes , as the Rockets never led by more than 12 points . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets went just 42 percent from the floor and a meager 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors also out - rebounded the Rockets 48 - 41 , giving them a huge advantage in this one . The Raptors were led by DeMar DeRozan , who went 14 - for - 27 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 42 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and a blocked shot as well . He 's had a nice two - game stretch where he 's combined for 54 points , 12 rebounds and 10 assists . Jonas Valanciunas was also a big factor in the win as well , finishing with 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) , nine rebounds and five blocked shots . It was his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 15 points and 12 rebounds . Coming just shy of a double - double , Jonas Valanciunas finished with 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) , nine rebounds and five blocked shots . It was his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 15 points and 12 rebounds . Coming just shy of a double - double , Jonas Valanciunas finished with 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) , nine rebounds and five blocked shots . It was his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 15 points and 12 rebounds . Coming off the bench , Louis Williams chipped in with 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) and five assists . For the Rockets , James Harden did everything he could to keep the Rockets in this game . He went 9 - for - 21 from the field and 3 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding five rebounds and five assists . He 's now averaging 16 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists on the year . Trevor Ariza was the only other starter in double figures , as he finished with 15 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , eight rebounds and five assists . The Rockets ' next game will be at home against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday , while the Rockets will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Saturday .

The Miami Heat defeated the Denver Nuggets , 106 - 98 , at Pepsi Center on Saturday . The Heat ( 6 - 12 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it took a late run to pull out the win . It was a close game throughout , as there were 11 ties and 11 lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with Miami going just 6 - of - 18 from the charity stripe , while the Nuggets went 9 - of - 32 . Miami also dominated the shooting , hitting 42 percent of their shots , while holding the Nuggets to just 42 percent from the field . Miami ( 6 - 12 ) had to play this game without Goran Dragic and Justise Winslow , but they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal . Hassan Whiteside did all he could to keep the Nuggets hanging around , as he totaled 25 points , 16 rebounds and four blocks in the win . Wayne Ellington led the starters in scoring , as he dropped 22 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting off the bench . Goran Dragic was the only other starter in double figures , as he accumulated 16 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Tyler Johnson was a nice spark off the bench , providing 18 points and seven assists . The Nuggets ( 7 - 11 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to climb back into the playoff hunt . Nikola Jokic was the player of the game , as he collected 17 points , 14 rebounds and three assists on 7 - of - 11 shooting . Danilo Gallinari finished second on the team , totaling 17 points , four rebounds and four assists . Jameer Nelson started for Emmanuel Mudiay ( knee ) and accrued 17 points , five rebounds and eight assists . Nikola Jokic was the only other starter in double figures , amassing 17 points , 14 rebounds and three assists off the bench . The Nuggets will look to keep rolling on Monday against the Orlando Magic .

The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 107 - 96 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Saturday . The recent form of these teams would indicate an easy win , but the Hornets had other ideas . In fact , the Hornets led by 10 after the first quarter , as they never relinquished the lead after that . Defense was key for the Hornets , as they held the Bucks to 42 percent from the field , 19 percent from three - point range and 75 percent from the free - throw line . The Hornets also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 51 - 34 . The Hornets ( 0 - 1 ) have been one of the surprises of the season , as this marks their first win of the season . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist led the team in scoring , as he tallied 23 points and 14 rebounds . Kemba Walker finished second on the team , collecting 17 points , eight assists and two steals . Roy Hibbert recorded a double - double , totaling 15 points , 10 rebounds and five blocks . Cody Zeller was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 15 points , 10 rebounds and five blocks on 5 - of - 6 shooting . Charlotte will look to start a new winning streak on Friday in a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets . The Bucks ( 0 - 1 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and they nearly pulled out another upset here . Nikola Vucevic also did his part in the loss , scoring 33 points ( 16 - 24 FG , 1 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds and four assists . It was his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 21 points and 12 rebounds . Coming off the bench , Victor Oladipo shot an efficient 11 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 33 points . He 's now averaging 16 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Danny Ridnour chipped in with nine points ( 2 - 3 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt ) and three assists . The Bulls received nearly all of their production from Pau Gasol , who went 10 - for - 16 from the field and 8 - for - 10 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding 14 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 58 points and 29 rebounds over his last two games . Derrick Rose was able to post a double - double of his own , with 18 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 3 FT ) , seven assists and two steals . He 's now averaging 16 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The only other Bull in double figures was Aaron Brooks , who came off the bench for 12 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and four assists . The Magic 's next game will be at home against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , while the Bulls will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 32 - 13 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 29 - 15 ) 103 - 96 on Monday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Wizards 34 - 26 right away in the first quarter . Along with the strong start , the Trail Blazers went 40 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards went 49 percent from the floor and just 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers were led by the duo of LaMarcus Aldridge and LaMarcus Aldridge . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice bounce back game for him . He 's now averaging 16 points and 6 rebounds on the year . He 's now averaging 15 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Wall finished with 25 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , nine assists and four rebounds , while Pierce had 19 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and six rebounds of his own . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Wizards , as he 's averaging only 13 points on the year . He 's had a nice stretch of four games , averaging 17 points , 6 rebounds and 2 assists over that span , so he showed no signs of slowing down Sunday . The Timberwolves got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Grizzlies 25 - 17 right away in the first quarter . The Timberwolves were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves went 43 percent from the floor and just 17 percent from deep . The Timberwolves also out - rebounded the Grizzlies 43 - 30 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Indiana Pacers defeated the Los Angeles Clippers , 111 - 102 , at Staples Center on Monday . The Pacers ( 10 - 10 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it took a late run to pull out the upset win . In fact , the Pacers won the first quarter , 35 - 17 , while Los Angeles held a double - digit lead for the majority of the game . Defense was key for the Pacers , as they held the Clippers to 44 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . The Pacers also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 49 - 34 . The Pacers ( 10 - 10 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to fall down the standings . Paul George led the way for the Pacers , as he tallied 16 points , seven rebounds , five assists and three steals . Jeff Teague finished second on the team , collecting 15 points , three assists and three steals . Myles Turner totaled 12 points , three rebounds and three assists . Rodney Stuckey led the bench , as he provided 16 points , three rebounds and three assists . On deck for the Pacers is a road matchup with the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday . The Clippers ( 16 - 6 ) have now lost five - straight games , as they continue to fall down the standings . Blake Griffin did all he could for Los Angeles , as he led the team with 24 points , 16 rebounds and five assists . Chris Paul went just 5 - of - 9 from the field , but finished with 18 points , two rebounds and 11 assists . DeAndre Jordan was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled nine points , 15 rebounds , two steals and two blocks . On deck for Los Angeles is a home matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday .
The Washington Wizards ( 6 - 4 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 7 - 6 ) 97 - 95 on Monday . The Wizards came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it took a late run by the Wizards to pull out a win . The key for Washington was their shooting , as they shot 49 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range , while the Pistons went 46 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range . They also held the Pistons to just 46 percent shooting from the field and 31 percent from three - point range . Marcin Gortat was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 14 points and eight rebounds . Ramon Sessions led the bench with 14 points , four rebounds and nine assists . On deck for Washington is a matchup with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday . The Pistons played this game without point guard Reggie Jackson and they didn’t miss a beat . Reggie Jackson stepped up in his absence though , as he tallied 20 points , nine assists and three rebounds . Ersan Ilyasova was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 18 points , five rebounds and two assists . Ersan Ilyasova was a nice spark off the bench , as he amassed 18 points , five rebounds and two assists . The Pistons next game will be on Monday against the New York Knicks .

He 's now averaging 15 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Patrick Patterson also played well off the bench , as he scored 16 points off the bench . The Raptors will look to build off this win in a tough matchup , when they host the New York Knicks on Monday . The Pelicans played this game without Anthony Davis and Jrue Holiday , but they simply did n't have enough bullets in the West . The New York Knicks defeated the Detroit Pistons , 105 - 102 , at Madison Square Garden on Monday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows just that . In fact , there were 10 ties and 11 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 11 points . Defense was key for New York , as they held the Pistons to 35 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . Detroit also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 52 - 40 . The Pistons also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 52 - 40 . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope led the way for Detroit , as he tallied 21 points , four rebounds and three assists . Tobias Harris finished second on the team , totaling 19 points and 10 rebounds . Jon Leuer was a nice spark off the bench , providing 17 points , nine rebounds and three assists on 7 - of - 11 shooting . Jon Leuer was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 17 points , nine rebounds and three assists off the bench . On deck for the Pistons is a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday . New York ( 5 - 6 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and they nearly pulled out another upset here . Kristaps Porzingis did all he could for New York , as he led the team with 35 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Carmelo Anthony finished with 22 points , five rebounds and three assists . Derrick Rose was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 15 points , five rebounds and three assists . On deck for the Knicks is a road matchup against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 5 - 19 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 11 - 13 ) 95 - 90 on Monday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Pistons got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 23 - 14 right away in the first quarter . The Kings were able to use their superior shooting to start the game , going 44 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 36 percent from the floor and 38 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons had all five starters reach double figures in points . Greg Monroe led the way , going 8 - for - 13 from the field and 8 - for - 9 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding eight rebounds and a steal . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 58 points and 22 rebounds over his last two games . Josh Smith was also a big factor in the win as well , as he finished with 21 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) , 13 rebounds and six assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 58 points and 22 rebounds over his last two games . Andre Drummond had a double - double of his own with 12 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 FT ) and 10 rebounds . It was his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging an impressive 21 points and 13 rebounds per game . Andre Drummond had a double - double of his own with 12 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 FT ) and 10 rebounds . The Kings received most of their production from Rudy Gay , who posted 20 points ( 6 - 22 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , eight rebounds and eight assists in 36 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaged 20 points , 5 rebounds and 8 assists per game . Ben McLemore also had a solid showing , scoring 14 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 4 - 8 3Pt ) and grabbing six rebounds . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Kings . Carl Landry was the only other Kings ' player in double figures , as he finished with 15 points in 24 minutes .
